name: The Last Defense (itch) (Thefeelz)
description:
CONTROLS:

Movement: Arrow Keys

Shield: S Key

Main Laser: Z Key

Missile: X key

Project Lead- Brandon Hinz

Programmer - Tim Wenzel

Artist- Omar Perez

In The Last Defense, you are one of the few remaining pilots left to defend earth and push the Alien invasion back. Immideatley you will be greeted with a screen with child like drawings, which is intentional. While you play The Last Defense, you will be not only upgrading your ship and defeating the Aliens pushing them back to their home planet. You are also upgrading the entire game as you go! You can upgrade the Menu Graphics, you can Upgrade sound effects, everything that can be potentially upgraded, will be able to be ugpraded!
